ENGLISH: This is it...\| The scriptures all lead to this place...\| where it all began.
ZH-cn: 就是这里……\|圣典指向了这个地方……\|一切的起始……

ENGLISH: Holy Donar...\| hear me...\| I have made the journey...\! I bring to you the voices of your followers...\| thousands of them...\| hear us and hear our plea...
ZH-cn: 圣多纳尔呀……\|请听我说吧……\|我完成了朝圣……\!带来了您的信徒的心声……\|成千上万的信徒等着您……\|请倾听我们，倾听我们的祈求吧……

ENGLISH: We have nothing left to give...
